posts.post_content:
[strike]1910 Piedmont t206 Davy Jones with partial name on top.  It is graded SGC 60, but this easily could have graded higher with a MC qualifier from PSA.  It is hard to find high grade cards with a partial name on top from SGC. $100[/strike] BEST OFFER ACCEPTED

[IMG]http://whitewhalecards.com/files/card_images/user_cards/dd99c64e2579fa68/small/545e71157d3b1_front.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://whitewhalecards.com/files/card_images/user_cards/dd99c64e2579fa68/small/545e71fea45f8_rear.jpg[/IMG]

Lucky Wright t206, SGC 20.  Beautiful VG front with stained reverse and some pencil writing. SOLD

[IMG]http://whitewhalecards.com/files/card_images/user_cards/85ca9714e18ae855/small/545e7310959de_front.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://whitewhalecards.com/files/card_images/user_cards/85ca9714e18ae855/small/545e7310959de_rear.jpg[/IMG]



[strike]Bunk Congalton. SGC 20.  This is a clear case of buying the card not the holder. The low grade is from the attractive stamp on the reverse.  This is the Harold A Perris stamp. $59[/strike] offer accepted

[IMG]http://whitewhalecards.com/files/card_images/user_cards/ae04b682eaa47fbc/small/545e742b98238_front.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://whitewhalecards.com/files/card_images/user_cards/ae04b682eaa47fbc/small/545e742b98238_rear.jpg[/IMG]
Best offer accepted on JONES.  Accepting offers on the other two
Best offer accepted on Bunk.  If you are feeling lucky send me an offer for Lucky :D
